Interface ILayerStore

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LayerStore

    public interface ILayerStore

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ILayer getActiveLayer()
      returns the layer object that is currently active (selected in LayerList)
      java.util.List<ILayer> getAllLayers()
      returns the complete list of all layers which contain all geometries.
      IBackgroundImage getBackgroundImage()
      returns the background-image object
      java.util.List<ILayer> getLayersInBoundingBox(int x1, int x2, int y1, int y2)
      will return all layers that have geometries that are (partially) within the given bounding box.
      java.util.List<ILayer> getVisibleLayers()
      get list of visible layers
      void setActiveLayer(ILayer active)
      set the layer that is currently active
      void setBackgroundImage(IBackgroundImage backgroundImage)
      sets the background-image object
